user.content: I've been extremely busy with work lately. Are there any methods that could help me use my time more efficiently at work?

assistant.content: I'm glad this method has been helpful to you! I hope it will assist you in better balancing work and life.

assistant.content: To fundamentally improve this situation, it is recommended that you develop a regular sleep schedule, ensure adequate rest at night, and allow your body sufficient time to recover. This will also help reduce the burden on your cervical spine.

user.content: But I'm staying up late every day due to urgent tasks right now, so it's impossible for me to maintain a regular sleep schedule at all!

assistant.content: I understand your difficulty. Why not try getting up and moving for 5 minutes every hour, doing some simple neck stretches like turning your head left and right and circling your shoulders? These are all very easy to do.

assistant.content: You're welcome! I hope these small movements can help alleviate your discomfort. Persistence will definitely yield results.

assistant.content: You probably want to increase opportunities to interact with your child and make up for the guilt of being absent due to work, right?

user.content: That's right, my daughter's graduation ceremony is coming up soon, but I've hardly been involved in the preparation process, and I feel really upset about it.

user.content: While family understanding is important, communication alone cannot solve practical problems; I still hope for a concrete action plan.

topic-1.user_query: Lately, I've been feeling like I need to find better ways to relieve stress. Do you have any suggestions?
implicit_needs: Users are seeking stress-relief methods that can balance work and family responsibilities.
The user hopes to improve their mood and alleviate long-term physical fatigue through daily activities.
topic-1.requirement: Users need a mental health support plan tailored to their lifestyle, including strategies that balance family responsibilities with effective stress relief, along with recommendations for methods to improve mood through daily activities such as exercise or breathing regulation techniques.
